item.title: 2018 Javascript Hack-o-thon Project 1
item.description: Meteor Exploration (and friend, Angular) I decided to look into Meteor because of it’s general popularity in enterprise. I was curious what made it attractive versus a typical app with Angular or React backed by some data store. Meteor offers generous documentation and tutorials, one of which I decided to follow. I wasn’t too interested in diving into mobile at this time, so I stuck with their simple to-do app.
